headline.main: EU Readies Cash to Help Ireland Cut Energy Dependence on Brexit Britain
headline.print_headline: EU Readies Cash to Help Ireland Cut Energy Dependence on Brexit Britain

lead_paragraph: Two big Irish energy projects designed to reduce dependence on Britain are set to benefit from EU funding as the bloc steps up efforts to support the country with the most to lose when its bigger neighbor quits the European Union.
snippet: Two big Irish energy projects designed to reduce dependence on Britain are set to benefit from EU funding as the bloc steps up efforts to support the country with the most to lose when its bigger neighbor quits the European Union....
